title: Food security in drought affected regions in Somalia

tasks.task: Operating machinery at a fertilizer mixing station
subtasks: Positioning self on the tricycle
Operating the controls for the conveyor belt
Monitoring the flow of material into the hopper
Verifying calibration of the mixing capability

tasks.task: Attaching a pivoting conveyor belt to the tricycle
subtasks: Loosening the locking bolts on the conveyor belt
Aligning the conveyor belt with the tricycle's transport mechanism
Securing the conveyor belt to the tricycle using locking bolts

tasks.task: Observing crop growth on the field
subtasks: Walking along the edge of the field
Visually assessing the general condition of the crops
Checking for signs of pests or diseases

///the above process involves transcribing and task-ifying the activities described in the provided video transcript. The MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs are derived from the actions mentioned by the narrator and observed in the transcript. The aim is to break down each major activity into specific sub-tasks that a person would perform physically.
